id: Super Simple Monthly Review - a Notion template to gain clarity
name: Super Simple Monthly Review - a Notion template to gain clarity
description: I wasn't a fan of monthly reviews at first. It seemed daunting to me, and I wasn't sure where to start, how much detail to include, or how to stay consistent from one month to the next. But I knew monthly reviews could be a powerful tool for growth, so I created a template for myself.This template helps me:Gain clarity on my projectsGet a better overview of what needs to be doneStay focused on long-term goalsCelebrate successesQuickly identify and address issuesIdentify areas that need improveme
features: Gainclarityon my projects; Get a betteroverviewof what needs to be done; Stayfocusedon long-term goals; Celebratesuccesses; Quicklyidentifyandaddressissues; Identify areas that needimprovement; Measureprogressand staymotivated; Simple template; Fully customizable; Write your monthly review directly inside Notion
